title: Rogério Lourenço
text:
Rogério Moraes Lourenço or simply Rogério Lourenço (born March 20, 1971 in <a href="Rio%20de%20Janeiro">Rio de Janeiro</a>), is a Brazilian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Coach%20%28sport%29">manager</a> and former <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29%23Centre-back">centre back</a>.
He has managed <a href="Saudi%20Arabia%20national%20under-20%20football%20team">Saudi Arabia Under-20 team</a> since 28 March 2011.
